name: UKCoreTobaccoConsumption
title: UK Core Tobacco Consumption
description: A set of codes that define a patients level of consciousness. Selected from the SNOMED CT UK coding system: - DescendantOrSelfOf 266918002 | Tobacco smoking consumption - 228500003 | Moist tobacco consumption - 228510007 | Chewed tobacco consumption - 228490006 | Snuff consumption - MINUS - 401201003 | Cigarette pack-years - 782516008 | Number of calculated pack years for cumulative lifetime tobacco exposure
